name: soppiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or fact of being soppy (= showing or feeling too much emotion, especially love): Soppiness is at the very heart of the successful love letter. The expression on her face was of doting soppiness. See
soppy
More examplesFewer examplesShe tells me later that she loathes soppiness.His books are full of insight without being burdened by soppiness.She is a fairytale princess who sings with the sweet soprano soppiness of Snow White.
